mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.f_erpid AS "erpId", a.f_number AS "number", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_deptid AS "deptId", a.f_emplid AS "emplId", a.f_currencyid AS "currencyId", a.f_erpnote AS "erpNote", a.f_status AS "status", a.f_creditamt AS "crediTamt", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_customer a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ${dataScope}
AND a.f_erpid LIKE '%'||#{erpId}||'%' '%'+#{erpId}+'%' concat('%',#{erpId},'%')
AND a.f_number LIKE '%'||#{number}||'%' '%'+#{number}+'%' concat('%',#{number},'%')
AND a.f_name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_customer( id, f_erpid, f_number, f_name, f_deptid, f_emplid, f_currencyid, f_erpnote, f_status, f_creditamt, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{erpId}, #{number}, #{name}, #{deptId}, #{emplId}, #{currencyId}, #{erpNote}, #{status}, #{crediTamt}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_customer SET f_erpid = #{erpId}, f_number = #{number}, f_name = #{name}, f_deptid = #{deptId}, f_emplid = #{emplId}, f_currencyid = #{currencyId}, f_erpnote = #{erpNote}, f_status = #{status}, f_creditamt = #{crediTamt}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
